title: Tuesday Post Show (08-02-22)
itunes:title: Tuesday Post Show (08-02-22)
description:
Bobby shares some listener reviews of his new TV show “Snake in the Grass”. He talks about the top questions people asked him during the press tour and how he was surprised so many people stayed up to watch it. A man who got caught speeding at 161 MPH, a new TikTok trend where people are requesting wheelchairs to get through airport faster and Eddie says Movie Mike was wrong about a movie review. ***SPOILER ALERT***: At the end of this, we talk about Snake in the Grass.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
